PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: SourceConnectionTestInterval
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: How often (in seconds) to create test connections to the underlying datasource to see if it is available.

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ExceptionOnMaxRows
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if an Exception should be thrown if the specified value for Maximum Result Rows is exceeded; else no exception and no more than the maximum will be returned

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: ServiceMonitoringEnabled
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Whether to monitor the underlying data source to see if it is available.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Immutable
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: True if the source never changes.

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: SearchDefaultBaseDN
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Default Base DN for LDAP Searches

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.cleaning_interval
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the interval to cleaning the pool

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapAdminUserDN
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: User DN for the LDAP admin account.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapMaxCriteria
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Maximum number of criteria supported in an LDAP search filter.

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapAdminUserPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password of the LDAP admin user account.

PropertyDefinition.Name: SearchDefaultScope
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Default Scope for LDAP Searches

PropertyDefinition.Name: RestrictToObjectClass
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Restrict Searches To Named Object Class
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Restrict Searches to objectClass named in the Name field for a table

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.max_connections
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the maximum number of connections for the connection pool

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapTxnTimeoutInMillis
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Timeout value for LDAP searches. Defaults to TCP timeout value.

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.wait_for_source_time
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the time to wait if the connection is not available

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapUrl
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Ldap URL of the server, including port number.

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.live_and_unused_time
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the idle time of the connection before it should be closed if pool shrinking is enabled

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.enable_shrinking
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set whether to enable the pool shrinking

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: username
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Name value for Salesforce authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: InLimit
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum number of values that can be supplied in an IN criteria

PropertyDefinition.Name: password
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password value for Salesforce authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: URL
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: URL for connecting to Salesforce

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorCapabilities
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to provide the Connector Capabilities

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: EnforceColumnCount
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: This forces the number of columns in text file to match what was modeled

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: CharacterEncodingScheme
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: A character-encoding scheme is a mapping between a coded character set and a set of octet (eight-bit byte) sequences. Some samples are UTF-8,ISO-8859-1,UTF-16)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectionType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connection type used to get the XML data

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: AuthPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password value for authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: SAMLPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: SAML Property File (only required when SAML profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: SAML Security property file (saml.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: wsdl
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: URL to Web Service Definition File

PropertyDefinition.Name: AuthUserName
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Name value for authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: WSSecurityType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Type of WS-Security to be used; Combinations of multiple security types can be used with a space in-between. Allowed types are: (UsernameToken, UsernameToken-Digest, SAMLTokenUnsigned, SAMLTokenSigned, Signature, Timestamp, Encrypt)

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncryptUserName
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encrypt UserName (only if Encrypt profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The username to be used in the encryption; if blank uses auth username

PropertyDefinition.Name: EndPoint
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: An alternate service endpoint other than one specified in WSDL, to execute the service

PropertyDefinition.Name: SecurityType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Type of Authentication to used with the web service; If WS-Secuirty is being used, then WS-Secuirty type must be defined

PropertyDefinition.Name: CryptoPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: User Crypto Property File (If SAML or Signature profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The file defines properties of cryptography;defines the certificates;(crypto.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectionType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connection type used to get the XML data

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncryptPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encrypt crypto property file (only if Encrypt profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The file defines properties of cryptography for encryption of the message;(crypto.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrustType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Only required for Signature and Signed SAML; The issuer-serial method presumes that all trusted users of the service are known to the service and have pre-registered their certificate chains before using the service. The direct-reference method presumes that the service operator trusts all users with certificates issued by a trusted CA.

PropertyDefinition.Name: TextExtractionThreshold
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: extract text sections larger than this size to a file where more efficient access as a CLOB can be effected.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: SaxFilterProviderClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class the provides extended XML Filters

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxFileCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of file cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: LogRequestResponseDocs
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Log XML Request and Response Documents
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Write the request and response documents to the log at Info level

PropertyDefinition.Name: InputStreamFilterClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess raw XML input stream

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxMemoryCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of in-memory cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: QueryPreprocessorClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess the IQuery

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorCapabilities
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to provide the Connector Capabilities

PropertyDefinition.Name: TextExtractionThreshold
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Extract text sections larger than this size to a file where more efficient access as a CLOB can be effected.

PropertyDefinition.Name: SaxFilterProviderClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class the provides extended XML Filters

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxFileCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of file cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: HttpBasicAuthPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password value for HTTP basic authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: ProxyUri
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The URI of the proxy server

PropertyDefinition.Name: ExceptionOnIntraQueryCacheExpiration
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Throw an exception when a document expires from the cache between executing different parts of a single query (instead of requesting the document again)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorCapabilities
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to provide the Connector Capabilities

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: HttpBasicAuthUserName
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Name value for HTTP basic authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: Uri
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The URI of the HTTP source

PropertyDefinition.Name: UseHttpBasic
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Use basic HTTP Authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: LogRequestResponseDocs
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Log XML Request and Response Documents
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Write the request and response documents to the log at Info level

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrustDeserializerClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to process trusted payloads and execution payloads

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxMemoryCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of in-memory cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: InputStreamFilterClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess raw XML input stream

PropertyDefinition.Name: HostnameVerifier
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Class implementing javax.net.ssl.HostnameVerifier. Used to implement a hostname mismatch workaround.

PropertyDefinition.Name: QueryPreprocessorClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess the IQuery

PropertyDefinition.Name: TextExtractionThreshold
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Extract text sections larger than this size to a file where more efficient access as a CLOB can be effected.

PropertyDefinition.Name: AuthPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password value for authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: SaxFilterProviderClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class the provides extended XML Filters

PropertyDefinition.Name: AuthUserName
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Name value for authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: WSSecurityType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Type of WS-Security to be used; Combinations of multiple security types can be used with a space in-between. Allowed types are: (UsernameToken, UsernameToken-Digest, SAMLTokenUnsigned, SAMLTokenSigned, Signature, Timestamp, Encrypt)

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncryptUserName
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encrypt UserName (only if Encrypt profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The username to be used in the encryption; if blank uses auth username

PropertyDefinition.Name: ExceptionOnSOAPFault
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Throw connector exception when SOAP fault is returned from source.

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxFileCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of file cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: CryptoPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: User Crypto Property File (If SAML or Signature profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The file defines properties of cryptography;defines the certificates;(crypto.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: SOAPAction
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Value for SOAP-Action header

PropertyDefinition.Name: ProxyUri
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The URI of the proxy server

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncryptPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encrypt crypto property file (only if Encrypt profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The file defines properties of cryptography for encryption of the message;(crypto.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ExceptionOnIntraQueryCacheExpiration
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Throw an exception when a document expires from the cache between executing different parts of a single query (instead of requesting the document again)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorCapabilities
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to provide the Connector Capabilities

PropertyDefinition.Name: SAMLPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: SAML Property File (only required when SAML profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: SAML Security property file (saml.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncodingStyle
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encoding Style (RPC - Encoded, RPC - Literal, Document - Literal, Document - Encoded)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Encoding Style

PropertyDefinition.Name: Uri
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The URI of the HTTP source

PropertyDefinition.Name: SecurityType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Type of Authentication to used with the web service; If WS-Secuirty is being used, then WS-Secuirty type must be defined

PropertyDefinition.Name: LogRequestResponseDocs
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Log XML Request and Response Documents
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Write the request and response documents to the log at Info level

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrustDeserializerClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to process trusted payloads and execution payloads

PropertyDefinition.Name: InputStreamFilterClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess raw XML input stream

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxMemoryCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of in-memory cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: HostnameVerifier
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: a class implmenting javax.net.ssl.HostnameVerifier. Used to implement a hostname mismatch workaround.

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrustType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Only required for Signature and Signed SAML; The issuer-serial method presumes that all trusted users of the service are known to the service and have pre-registered their certificate chains before using the service. The direct-reference method presumes that the service operator trusts all users with certificates issued by a trusted CA.

PropertyDefinition.Name: QueryPreprocessorClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess the IQuery

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: UseBindVariables
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Use prepared statements and bind variables

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: DatabaseTimeZone
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Time zone of the database, if different than Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: TransactionIsolationLevel
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the data source transaction isolation level

PropertyDefinition.Name: SetCriteriaBatchSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Max number of values in an IN Predicate. Must be >= 0.

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectionSource
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Driver, DataSource, or XADataSource class name

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrimStrings
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Right Trim fixed character types returned as Strings

PropertyDefinition.Name: IsXA
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Is XA

PropertyDefinition.Name: UseCommentsInSourceQuery
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Use informational comments in Source Queries
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: This will embed /*comment*/ style comment with session/request id in source SQL query for informational purposes
